name: Simplistic Shooter
description:
My latest game, a 2D shooter game with a few useful mechanics to help you survive. Enemies will spawn from various locations at an increasing rate as time goes on. Shoot enemies to receive points as well as a small chance to get crate drops which give additional supplies. See tutorial for more in depth information.

Feedback is appreciated! If you wish to make a YouTube video about the game make sure you show me!
